data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Picea glauca (White spruce) from sample BUFFAPGL-11

Slope 0 deg, Geology: Granit und Gneis, Geröll und Sand, av. Tree height 20 m, Tree cover 60%, Shrub cover 40%, Herb cover 60%, Moss cover 50%, Vegatation type: Dicht. Best. hinter Geröllen v. Strandwall, Film number: 840A
